mapper.insert: insert into cart(custid, itemid, cnt) values(#{custid}, #{itemid}, #{cnt})
mapper.update: update cart set cnt=#{cnt} where cartid = #{cartid}
mapper.select: select * from cart where custid = #{custid} and itemid = #{itemid}
